page.title: 12Social Concerns in Cronton
page.content: {Social Concerns}It would appear that Cronton has changed vastly in some aspects in recent years. We questioned 66 households, and some dozen social concerns were expressed time and time again. The following seemed to be the uppermost in peoples minds. {Vandalism}Quote:"We don't keep livestock in Cronton anymore, because of the cruelty and damage done by some local youths." {Drug abuse,violence}Both that in real life and that shown on the television. {Pollution,crime}Litter problem, dogs fowling the footpaths and smoking allowed in public places. Chemical smells which drift over Cronton, are they harmful? Chemicals also being transported by road through the village.Could the lack of parental control be responcible for the increase in crime among the young?
